duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement, maintain, integrate, and troubleshoot applications (in-house and third party) under general direction.
Recommend technology solutions considering budget, business need, internal capabilities, and strategic direction.
Participate and serve as a technical expert on projects needing new applications, modification to existing applications, application updates, and testing.
Design or review new and existing application systems, perform complex systems analysis.
Integrate multiple systems utilizing different communication protocols and gateways. Write interface programs when necessary.
Follow standards for coding, documentation, and change control.
Write, debug, document, and implement solutions to complex problems using the appropriate application systems access and database tools.
Work with vendors and staff to document and specify software functional requirements.
Maintain security and integrity controls of the application system; manage user access to applications and data.
Review contracts to ensure product licenses, service agreements and products are correct and appropriate for defined business operation.
Monitor systems performance and recommend methods for improving efficiency through system and application design.
Attend product demonstrations, seminars, user group meetings, and other professional opportunities to maintain the necessary level of expertise and may provide or participate in user training.
Perform other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Computer Engineering or a related field and two years of experience in development, design, implementation, and application support.
